description: Deletes the specified inline policy that is embedded in the specified IAM role. A role can also have managed policies attached to it. To detach a managed policy from a role, use  DetachRolePolicy. For more information about policies, refer to Managed policies and inline policies in the IAM User Guide.

parameters.name: RoleName
parameters.description: The name (friendly name, not ARN) identifying the role that the policy is embedded in. This parameter allows (through its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: _+=,.@-

parameters.name: PolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the inline policy to delete from the specified IAM role. This parameter allows (through its regex pattern) a string of characters consisting of upper and lowercase alphanumeric characters with no spaces. You can also include any of the following characters: _+=,.@-
